mapper.select:
SELECT IDX, PRODUCTNM, IMGURL, NOMALAMT, SHIPAMT, COMMITIONAMT, CALCAMT, PAYAMT, INCOMEAMT, LOWAMT, PRODUCTLINK, USEYN, CREATEDTM, AUDITDTM, AUDITID, MEMO, LEADAMT FROM product_lst WHERE 1 = 1 AND USEYN = 'Y'
AND PRODUCTNM LIKE CONCAT("%", #{PRODUCTNM}, "%")
AND IDX = #{IDX}
ORDER BY PRODUCTNMDESC ASC
ORDER BY PRODUCTNMDESC DESC
ORDER BY CAST(IDX as unsigned)

SELECT pl.IDX, pl.PRODUCTNM, pl.IMGURL, IFNULL(pdl.DTLNOMALAMT, 0) as NOMALAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLSHIPAMT, 0) as SHIPAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLCOMMITIONAMT, 0) as COMMITIONAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLCALCAMT, 0) as CALCAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLPAYAMT, 0) as PAYAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLINCOMMAMT, 0) as INCOMMAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLLOWAMT, 0) as LOWAMT, IFNULL(pdl.DTLPRODUCTLINK, 0) as PRODUCTLINK, USEYN, pl.CREATEDTM, pl.AUDITDTM, pl.AUDITID, pl.MEMO, pl.LEADAMT FROM product_lst pl LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.productidx, b.IDX , b.SHOPIDX , b.DTLNOMALAMT , b.DTLSHIPAMT , b.DTLCOMMITIONAMT , b.DTLCALCAMT , b.DTLPAYAMT , b.DTLINCOMMAMT , b.DTLLOWAMT , b.DTLPRODUCTLINK from product_dtl_lst b where (b.productidx, b.DTLNOMALAMT) in ( SELECT a.PRODUCTIDX , MIN(CAST(a.DTLNOMALAMT as unsigned)) FROM product_dtl_lst a where useyn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.PRODUCTIDX ) ) pdl ON pl.IDX = pdl.PRODUCTIDX where USEYN = 'Y'
AND pl.PRODUCTNM LIKE CONCAT("%", #{PRODUCTNM}, "%")
AND pl.IDX = #{IDX}
ORDER BY pl.PRODUCTNMDESC ASC
ORDER BY pl.PRODUCTNMDESC DESC
ORDER BY CAST(pl.IDX as unsigned)

SELECT IDX, PRODUCTNM, IMGURL, NOMALAMT, SHIPAMT, COMMITIONAMT, CALCAMT, PAYAMT, INCOMEAMT, LOWAMT, PRODUCTLINK, USEYN, CREATEDTM, AUDITDTM, AUDITID, MEMO, LEADAMT FROM product_lst WHERE 1 = 1 AND USEYN = 'Y'

SELECT IDX, PRODUCTNM, IMGURL, NOMALAMT, SHIPAMT, COMMITIONAMT, CALCAMT, PAYAMT, INCOMEAMT, LOWAMT, PRODUCTLINK, USEYN, CREATEDTM, AUDITDTM, AUDITID, MEMO, LEADAMT FROM product_lst WHERE 1 = 1 AND USEYN = 'Y' AND IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_lst ( IDX, PRODUCTNM, IMGURL, NOMALAMT, SHIPAMT, COMMITIONAMT, CALCAMT, PAYAMT, INCOMEAMT, LOWAMT, PRODUCTLINK, USEYN, CREATEDTM, AUDITDTM, AUDITID, MEMO, LEADAMT ) VALUES ( (IFNULL( (SELECT MAX(CAST(cl.IDX AS INTEGER)) FROM product_lst cl WHERE 1 = 1 ) , 0 ) +1) , #{PRODUCTNM} , #{IMGURL} , IFNULL(#{NOMALAMT}, '0') , IFNULL(#{SHIPAMT}, '0') , IFNULL(#{COMMITIONAMT}, '0') , IFNULL(#{CALCAMT}, '0') , IFNULL(#{PAYAMT}, '0') , IFNULL(#{INCOMEAMT}, '0') , IFNULL(#{LOWAMT}, '0') , #{PRODUCTLINK} , 'Y' , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) , #{AUDITID} , #{MEMO} , #{LEADAMT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE product_lst SET PRODUCTNM = #{PRODUCTNM}, IMGURL = #{IMGURL}, NOMALAMT = #{NOMALAMT}, SHIPAMT = #{SHIPAMT}, COMMITIONAMT = #{COMMITIONAMT}, CALCAMT = #{CALCAMT}, PAYAMT = #{PAYAMT}, INCOMEAMT = #{INCOMEAMT}, LOWAMT = #{LOWAMT}, PRODUCTLINK = #{PRODUCTLINK}, AUDITDTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6), AUDITID = 'cila10', MEMO = #{MEMO}, LEADAMT = #{LEADAMT} WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
UPDATE product_lst SET USEYN = 'N', AUDITDTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
